document_data.caption: [[Artemis Entreri]]'s vampiric dagger.
document_data.name: ''Vampiric Dagger''
document_data.location:
[[Mere of Dead Men]], [[Sword Coast North]]
[[Thay]], [[Unapproachable East]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Vampiric daggers''''' were [[enchanted]] [[dagger]]s that drew strength from its victims, created sometime before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Vampiric daggers'' had blades of deadly sharpness and tiny serrations. They possessed a powerful ''+2'' enchantment that made the weapon's attacks deadlier and guided the wielder's hand toward their aim. Each successful strike with a ''vampiric dagger'' sapped the strength from the target, granting the wielder [[Vampiric (weapon quality)|vampiric]] ''[[Regenerate|regeneration]].
document_data.History: Sometime after the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, a ''vampiric dagger'' was handled by the leader of the three remnants of the [[Shadow Cult]] that followed the [[King of Shadows]]. The remnants of the cult holed up in a ruined fort in the [[Mere of Dead Men]], trying to resurrect the King. The priests used a ''vampiric dagger'' against a band of adventurers from [[Crossroad Keep]], sent by [[Khelgar Ironfist]] to end the cult once and for all.
document_data.Notable Users:
*[[Tharchion]] [[Aznar Thrul]] never parted with his ''vampiric dagger'' in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
*[[Renho Thane]], a [[transmuter]] apprentice of [[Szass Tam]]'s in [[1368 DR]].
